effect.name: Water Reflected (Background)
effect.description:
The shader provides an advanced water effect from a 2D view with reflection.
Last Updated: 2026-01-04 22:02
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Water Reflected (Background) Shader | 1.0 (29.12.2025) */
parameter.description: The shader provides an advanced water effect from a 2D view with reflection.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the entire effect.

parameter.name: Reflection Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the reflection effect.

parameter.name: Reflection Line Cut
parameter.description: This variable specifies where the reflection line should be located.

parameter.name: Multiplying Color
parameter.description: The variable specifies which color should be used for multiplication.

parameter.name: Adding Color
parameter.description: The variable specifies which color should be used for addition.

parameter.name: Safe Alpha Mixing
parameter.description: This variable determines the degree of Safe Alpha usage. Set to 0, it displays the result as in Direct3D9, and set to 1, it sets safe reflection fading to prevent artifacts (Direct3D11, Android, iOS, Mac)..

parameter.name: Safe Alpha Transition
parameter.description: This variable defines the Safe Alpha transition point. Use the always setting: ((Y Object - Y Top Frame) / ((Y Bottom Frame - Y Top Frame) + 0.0)), the alpha color of the reflection will fade or appear when necessary (Direct3D11, Android, iOS, Mac).

parameter.name: Safe Alpha Power
parameter.description: The value determines the size when Safe Alpha should start and end. The recommended value is 15 (Direct3D11, Android, iOS, Mac).

parameter.name: ( NormalMap )
parameter.description: Here are the variables for changing wave distortion settings.

parameter.name: Texture
parameter.description: Here, declare the texture of the normal map that will be used to distort the TexCoord position.

parameter.name: Offset X
parameter.description: The variable defines the texture shift along the X axis.

parameter.name: Offset Y
parameter.description: The variable defines the texture shift along the Y axis.

parameter.name: Strength
parameter.description: The variable determines the strength of distortion by the colors of pixels from the NormalMap texture.

parameter.name: Scale X
parameter.description: The variable defines the texture scale along the X axis.

parameter.name: Scale Y
parameter.description: The variable defines the texture scale along the Y axis.

parameter.name: ( Overlay )
parameter.description: Here are the variables for changing overlay settings.

parameter.name: Texture
parameter.description: Here, declare the texture of the normal map that will be used to distort the TexCoord position.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: The variable determines the degree of visibility of the texture overlay.

parameter.name: Addition Mixing
parameter.description: This variable determines the blending mode for adding the overlay texture to the rest.

parameter.name: Offset X
parameter.description: The variable defines the texture shift along the X axis.

parameter.name: Offset Y
parameter.description: The variable defines the texture shift along the Y axis.

parameter.name: Scale X
parameter.description: The variable defines the texture scale along the X axis.

parameter.name: Scale Y
parameter.description: The variable defines the texture scale along the Y axis.

parameter.name: ( Line )
parameter.description: Here are the variables for changing wave distortion settings.

parameter.name: Line thickness
parameter.description: The variable defines the size of the line between water and surface.

parameter.name: Line Color
parameter.description: TThe variable defines the color of the line between water and surface.

parameter.name: Line Mixing
parameter.description: The variable determines the visibility of the line between water and surface.

parameter.name: Line Ambient
parameter.description: The variable defines the scale of the ambient from the line (additional gradient).

parameter.name: Line Ambient
parameter.description: The variable determines the visibility of the ambient from line between water and surface.

parameter.name: ( Transformation )
parameter.description: Here are the variables for changing the position of point.

parameter.name: Point X
parameter.description: A variable that determines point position in the X axis.

parameter.name: Point Y
parameter.description: A variable that determines point position in the Y axis.

parameter.name: Rotation X
parameter.description: A variable that determines rotation.

parameter.name: X
parameter.description: Enables/disables flip for the X-Axis

parameter.name: Y
parameter.description: Enables/disables flip for the Y-Axis

parameter.name: ( Compatibility )
parameter.description: Here you will find options that have changed, but you can still achieve the previous effect.

parameter.name: Is Fusion Version Older Than 296?
parameter.description: (Only applies to Android and iOS!) This variable determines whether to use the newer background formatting. In Clickteam Fusion 2.5 for build 295.10 and earlier, the background texture was flipped along the Y axis, but this was changed in build 296.1. Check this option if you are using an older build!
